price: Ɛda a Dͻnhwere no bɛsie no, abͻneεfoͻ no bɛdi nse sε: Wͻtenaa (wiase) bεyε sε dͻnhwere baako pε bi. Saa ara na na wͻdane wͻn ho firi kwan pa no so, di atorͻ, yε nneεma a εmfata.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يُقۡسِمُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ مَا لَبِثُواْ غَيۡرَ سَاعَةٖۚ كَذَٰلِكَ كَانُواْ يُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yuq'simu al-muj'rimūna mā labithū ghayra sāʿatin kadhālika kānū yu'fakūna
